title: LEGENDS OF THE DARK KNIGHT 001-079 (2012-present) (DC) BATMAN
description:
A "digital first" series, featuring a variety of top-tier creators and their out of continuity takes on Batman. (In the tradition of the first LotDK series, which was published from 1989 to 2007.)

This torrent compiles digital weekly issues #1-#79 (2012-2013), the first 18 months worth of this volume. Several of the early stories have been reprinted in a monthly comic sold in stores, as well as a trade paperback. They include:

The Butler Did It, by Damon Lindelof and Jeff Lemire

All of the Above, by Jonathan Larsen and J.G. Jones

The Crime Never Committed, by Tom Taylor and Nicola Scott

Crisis in Identity, by B. Clay Moore and Ben Templesmith

Letters to Batman, by Steve Niles and Trevor Hairsine

A Game to Die for, by T.J. Fixman and Christopher Mitten

Batman the Movie, by Andrew Dabb and Giorgio Pontrelli

Together, by Jonathan Larsen and Tan Eng Huat

Slam!, by Joshua Hale Fialkov and Phil Hester

Gotham Spirit, by Jeff Parker and Gabriel Hardman

Dungeons and Dragons, by Michael Avon Oeming

Look Inside, by Rob Williams and Juan Jose Ryp

Haunted Arkham, by Joe Harris and Jason Masters

and much, much more...
